title: 3BR/2BA Townhome for Rent
posting_body: Welcome to the heart of Pico Rivera!
Located on a corner lot, step inside to see this spacious 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit.
This unit is the main unit in the front that has its own separate entrance and an extremely large family room!
With a fireplace in the living room, a fully remodeled bathroom, and laundry space, this unit is perfect for a family!
Come see this cozy home before it's too late!
Back unit is also available for lease.
Deposit amount to be determined by credit score.
If score is 700 or above: $3,500, if below 700: $7,000.
Tenant pays flat rate of $350 for water, gas, electric, trash utilities.
